member.name: T:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.SingleKeyBoard.SingleKeyBoardModule

The unity DI container (obtained through DI).

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.SingleKeyBoard.SingleKeyBoardModule.Initialize
member.summary: Registers a unique instance of each of the keyboard view-models in the dependency injection container and registers their views with the region manager to the corresponding region of the window.

member.name: T:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.SingleKeyBoard.ViewModels.QwertySpanishSingleKeyboardViewModel
member.summary: This class contains the state and logic relevant to the Spanish QWERTY single-character keyboard.This logic currently pertains the state of the shift button which enables toggling keys between one character and another, such as lowercase and uppercase.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance has shift down.
member.value: true if this instance has shift down; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.SingleKeyBoard.ViewModels.QwertySpanishSingleKeyboardViewModel.ResetShiftDownCommand
member.summary: Gets or sets the command for resetting shift down.
member.value: The command for resetting shift down.

member.summary: Gets or sets the command for setting shift down.
